content: the 2025 temperature block crochet pattern is designed around 13 days of weather every day you will crochet a round or catch up every 2 weeks with the whole square that represents the high or low temperature for your area this will ultimately give you 28 blocks for 364 days this will also allow you a rectangle layout of 4 x 7 blocks each one of my blocks measures 12 x 12 i use the last day of the year s temp for my border color this pattern will give you several tips and tricks for staying on track to get your blanket done pdf digital download only english / us terms only materials needed #4 worsted weight yarn in a variety of colors to meet your palette h 5 0 mm crochet hook scissors darning needle stitch markers abbreviations / us terms / english only bpsc - back post single_crochet chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet dc3l - double_crochet in the 3rd loop extfphdc - extended front post half_double_crochet fpdc - front post double_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet hdc3l - half_double_crochet in the 3rd loop mc - magic_ring ps - puff r - round single_crochet - single_crochet skip - skip space s - space s st s - stitch es treble_crochet - triple crochet yo - yarn over this pattern not the finished product is for personal use only the pattern and photos included are the property of tl crochet distribution and/or reproduction of this pattern is prohibited you may sell your finished products online in your shop or at local markets with pattern credit to tl crochet if you choose to post a finished product please tag my instagram or facebook account you can use #2025temperatureblock when posting so i can see your beautiful work and i can acknowledge it in my stories be sure to join my private pattern instruction group on facebook for help with my patterns and to see the upcoming sales first if you choose to join please answer all questions or admin will decline entry if you purchased this pattern somewhere besides etsy ravelry tlcrochet com or annie s publishing it was most likely pirated and sold illegally please reach out or report to the platform immediately i look forward to seeing all the beautiful color combinations of your finished pieces thank you for your continued support with the purchase of my patterns find me email tracylynncrochet@gmail com facebook tl crochet tl crochet group instagram tl crochet website tlcrochet com youtube tl crochet etsy tldotcrochet ravelry tl crochet mrstomcollins tik tok @tlcrochet
